targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    b.timestamp AS time,
    COUNT(m.id) AS num_proofs
FROM
    localnet.messages m
JOIN
    localnet.transactions t ON t.id = m.transaction_id
JOIN
    localnet.blocks b ON b.id = t.block_id
WHERE
    m.type_url = '/poktroll.proof.MsgSubmitProof'
    AND b.timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
    b.timestamp
ORDER BY
    b.timestamp;

SELECT
    $__timeGroup(b."timestamp", '1m') AS time,
    SUM(trim(both '"' from ea_num_relays.value)::bigint) AS total_num_relays,
    (ea_claim.value::json ->> 'supplier_operator_address') AS supplier_operator_address,
    (ea_claim.value::json -> 'session_header' ->> 'service_id') AS service_id
FROM
    localnet.events e
JOIN
    localnet.event_attributes ea_num_relays ON ea_num_relays.event_id = e.id
    AND ea_num_relays.key = 'num_relays'
JOIN
    localnet.event_attributes ea_claim ON ea_claim.event_id = e.id
    AND ea_claim.key = 'claim'
JOIN
    localnet.blocks b ON b.id = e.block_id
WHERE
    e.type = 'poktroll.proof.EventClaimCreated'
    AND b."timestamp" BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
    time, supplier_operator_address, service_id
ORDER BY
    time;

-- Average number of proofs per application

WITH proofs_per_block AS (
    SELECT
        b.height AS block_height,
        m.json::jsonb -> 'sessionHeader' ->> 'applicationAddress' AS application_address,
        COUNT(m.id) AS num_proofs
    FROM
        localnet.messages m
    JOIN
        localnet.transactions t ON t.id = m.transaction_id
    JOIN
        localnet.blocks b ON b.id = t.block_id
    WHERE
        m.type_url = '/poktroll.proof.MsgSubmitProof'
        AND b.timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
    GROUP BY
        b.height, application_address
)

SELECT
    application_address AS application,
    AVG(num_proofs) AS avg_num_proofs
FROM
    proofs_per_block
GROUP BY
    application
ORDER BY
    avg_num_proofs DESC;

panels.title: Average Number of Proofs per Application

targets.rawSql:
-- Average number of proofs per service

WITH proofs_per_block AS (
    SELECT
        b.height AS block_height,
        m.json::jsonb -> 'sessionHeader' ->> 'serviceId' AS service_id,
        COUNT(m.id) AS num_proofs
    FROM
        localnet.messages m
    JOIN
        localnet.transactions t ON t.id = m.transaction_id
    JOIN
        localnet.blocks b ON b.id = t.block_id
    WHERE
        m.type_url = '/poktroll.proof.MsgSubmitProof'
        AND b.timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
    GROUP BY
        b.height, service_id
)

SELECT
    service_id AS service,
    AVG(num_proofs) AS avg_num_proofs
FROM
    proofs_per_block
GROUP BY
    service
ORDER BY
    avg_num_proofs DESC;

panels.title: Average Number of Proofs per Service

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    b.timestamp AS time,
    COUNT(m.id) AS num_proofs,
    m.json::jsonb -> 'sessionHeader' ->> 'applicationAddress' AS application_address
FROM
    localnet.messages m
JOIN
    localnet.transactions t ON t.id = m.transaction_id
JOIN
    localnet.blocks b ON b.id = t.block_id
WHERE
    m.type_url = '/poktroll.proof.MsgSubmitProof'
    AND b.timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
    b.timestamp, application_address
ORDER BY
    b.timestamp;

SELECT
    b.timestamp AS time,
    COUNT(m.id) AS num_proofs,
    m.json::jsonb -> 'sessionHeader' ->> 'serviceId' AS service_id
FROM
    localnet.messages m
JOIN
    localnet.transactions t ON t.id = m.transaction_id
JOIN
    localnet.blocks b ON b.id = t.block_id
WHERE
    m.type_url = '/poktroll.proof.MsgSubmitProof'
    AND b.timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
    b.timestamp, service_id
ORDER BY
    b.timestamp;

SELECT
    b.timestamp AS time,
    COUNT(m.id) AS num_proofs,
    m.json::jsonb ->> 'supplierOperatorAddress' AS supplier_operator_address
FROM
    localnet.messages m
JOIN
    localnet.transactions t ON t.id = m.transaction_id
JOIN
    localnet.blocks b ON b.id = t.block_id
WHERE
    m.type_url = '/poktroll.proof.MsgSubmitProof'
    AND b.timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
    b.timestamp, supplier_operator_address
ORDER BY
    b.timestamp;

-- Serviced relays (from claims)
WITH serviced_relays AS (
    SELECT
        (ea_claim.value::json ->> 'supplier_operator_address') AS supplier_operator_address,
        SUM(trim(both '"' from ea_num_relays.value)::bigint) AS total_serviced_relays
    FROM
        localnet.events e
    JOIN
        localnet.event_attributes ea_num_relays ON ea_num_relays.event_id = e.id
            AND ea_num_relays.key = 'num_relays'
    JOIN
        localnet.event_attributes ea_claim ON ea_claim.event_id = e.id
            AND ea_claim.key = 'claim'
    JOIN
        localnet.blocks b ON b.id = e.block_id
    WHERE
        e.type = 'poktroll.proof.EventClaimCreated'
        AND b."timestamp" BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
    GROUP BY
        supplier_operator_address
),

-- Estimated relays (from proofs)
estimated_relays AS (
    SELECT
        (ea_proof.value::json ->> 'supplier_operator_address') AS supplier_operator_address,
        SUM(trim(both '"' from ea_num_relays.value)::bigint) AS total_estimated_relays
    FROM
        localnet.events e
    JOIN
        localnet.event_attributes ea_num_relays ON ea_num_relays.event_id = e.id
            AND ea_num_relays.key = 'num_relays'
    JOIN
        localnet.event_attributes ea_proof ON ea_proof.event_id = e.id
            AND ea_proof.key = 'proof'
    JOIN
        localnet.blocks b ON b.id = e.block_id
    WHERE
        e.type = 'poktroll.proof.EventProofSubmitted'
        AND b."timestamp" BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
    GROUP BY
        supplier_operator_address
)

-- Combine the totals per supplier
SELECT
    COALESCE(s.supplier_operator_address, e.supplier_operator_address) AS supplier_operator_address,
    COALESCE(s.total_serviced_relays, 0) AS total_serviced_relays,
    COALESCE(e.total_estimated_relays, 0) AS total_estimated_relays
FROM
    serviced_relays s
FULL OUTER JOIN
    estimated_relays e ON s.supplier_operator_address = e.supplier_operator_address
ORDER BY
    supplier_operator_address;

panels.title: cumulative number of relays claims vs proofs per supplier
